text:
Tirupattur Town police have nabbed 10 persons on charges of kidnapping a man, who had allegedly cheated them to the tune of Rs. 40 lakh, on Saturday. Police said Syed Muthasir (28), of Tirupattur, had taken money from them for purchasing home appliances online at cheap rates.

However, Muthasir went into hiding earlier this month. On information about his location, they nabbed him and reportedly roughed him up.

Following this, Muthasir’s family lodged a complaint with the police that he was kidnapped. Police booked a case and nabbed the 10 persons.

Police said they have not filed a case of cheating against him as they were yet to receive a complaint. - Staff Reporter
title: 10 held for kidnapping man
